data.title: Ethereum Dives Below $2,880 as Bears Tighten Their Grip on the Trend
data.description: Ethereum price started a fresh decline below $2,950. ETH is down over 5%, trading below $2,880, and might continue to move down.Ethereum Price Dips Over 5%Ethereum price failed to stay above $3,000 and started a fresh decline, like Bitcoin. ETH price declined below $2,880 to enter a bearish zone.Th…
